option.name: updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Link from "next/link"; export default function About() { return ( {/* Hero Section */}

About FarmFresh

We're on a mission to connect communities with fresh, local produce while supporting sustainable farming practices across Bangladesh.

{/* Mission & Vision */}

Our Mission

To revolutionize the way people access fresh, organic produce by creating a direct connection between local farmers and consumers. We believe in supporting sustainable agriculture while providing communities with the freshest, most nutritious food possible.

Through our platform, we empower farmers to reach wider markets, earn fair prices for their produce, and build lasting relationships with customers who value quality and sustainability.

{/* Values */}

Our Values

These core values guide everything we do and shape our commitment to farmers and customers alike.

Sustainability

We promote eco-friendly farming practices that protect our environment for future generations.

Community

Building strong relationships between farmers and consumers to create thriving local communities.

Quality

Ensuring the highest standards of freshness, taste, and nutritional value in every product.

{/* Stats */}

Our Impact

Making a difference in communities across Bangladesh

500+
Active Farmers
10,000+
Happy Customers
50+
Districts Covered
2,000+
Products Available
{/* Team */}

Meet Our Team

Passionate individuals working together to transform agriculture and food distribution.

Ahmed Rahman

CEO & Founder

Former agricultural engineer with 15+ years of experience in sustainable farming.

Fatima Khan

CTO

Technology leader passionate about using innovation to solve agricultural challenges.

Karim Hassan

Head of Operations

Supply chain expert ensuring efficient delivery from farm to table.

{/* Contact CTA */}

Get in Touch

Have questions about our platform or want to learn more about partnering with us?

Contact Us Join as Farmer
{/* Footer */}

FarmFresh

Local Farmer Booking

Connecting communities with fresh, local produce directly from farmers.

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Products
  • Farmers
  • About Us

For Farmers

  • Join as Farmer
  • Add Products
  • Manage Listings
  • Farmer Support

Support

  • Help Center
  • Contact Us
  • Terms of Service
  • Privacy Policy

© 2025 FarmFresh - Local Farmer Booking. All rights reserved by LWS.

); }

Through our platform, we empower farmers to reach wider markets, earn fair prices for their produce, and build lasting relationships with customers who value quality and sustainability.

import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Navigation from "@/components/Navigation"; import Link from "next/link"; export default function Farmers() { return ( <> {/* Page Header */}

Meet Our Farmers

Discover the passionate farmers who grow fresh, organic produce with care and dedication

{/* Farmers Grid */}
{/* Stats */}
500+
Active Farmers
50+
Districts Covered
2000+
Products Available
95%
Organic Certified
{/* Farmers Grid */}
{/* Farmer Card 1 */}
Certified

Rahim Ahmed

4.8

Sylhet, Bangladesh

Specializes in organic vegetables and has been farming for over 15 years. Known for premium tomatoes and leafy greens.

Farm Size: 5 acres
Products: 12
Vegetables Organic
{/* Farmer Card 2 */}
Certified

Shumi Rahman

4.9

Rangpur, Bangladesh

Expert in root vegetables and herbs. Uses traditional farming methods combined with modern organic practices.

Farm Size: 8 acres
Products: 18
Root Vegetables Herbs
{/* Farmer Card 3 */}
Certified

Sakib Hassan

4.7

Dhaka, Bangladesh

Focuses on leafy greens and microgreens. Pioneer in urban farming techniques and hydroponic systems.

Farm Size: 3 acres
Products: 15
Leafy Greens Hydroponic
{/* Farmer Card 4 */}
Certified

Anika Begum

4.6

Chittagong, Bangladesh

Specializes in cruciferous vegetables and seasonal fruits. Known for sustainable farming practices.

Farm Size: 6 acres
Products: 20
Cruciferous Fruits
{/* Farmer Card 5 */}
Certified

Karim Uddin

4.5

Rajshahi, Bangladesh

Expert in grain production and legumes. Uses crop rotation and natural pest control methods.

Farm Size: 12 acres
Products: 8
Grains Legumes
{/* Farmer Card 6 */}
Certified

Tariq Ali

4.9

Barisal, Bangladesh

Multi-crop farmer specializing in tropical fruits and spices. Practices permaculture and biodiversity farming.

Farm Size: 10 acres
Products: 25
Tropical Fruits Spices
{/* Load More */}
{/* Join as Farmer CTA */}

Want to Join Our Farmer Community?

Share your fresh produce with thousands of customers and grow your business

Join as Farmer
{/* Footer */}
